name: umgrf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))

stmt.origin: ibi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
stmt.pretty: ibi(c0 ∈ UMGraph, (c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 }))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wb(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph →(c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph →(c0 ∈ UMGraph ↔(c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 })))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wb(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph →(c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph →(c0 ∈ UMGraph ↔(c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 })))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wb(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph →(c0 ∈ UMGraph ↔(c1 : dom(c1)→ { s0 ∈ P(c2)|(# ` s0)= 2 })))
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: The edge function of an undirected multigraph is a function into unordered pairs of vertices. Version of ~ umgrfn without explicitly specified domain of the edge function. (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2020.)
